plot: Generations collide at a dinner party when a contestant from the TV show "Survivor" and a Holocaust survivor clash and Larry is in the middle. Larry and Cheryl renew their vows but Larry struggles with them and his lines for The Producers.

Generations collide at a dinner party when a contestant from the television show "Survivor" and a Holocaust survivor clash, and Larry is caught in the middle. Larry and Cheryl renew their vows, but Larry has a hard time remembering his--or his lines for The Producers.—halo1k
